definitions.definition: a defensive wall or other reinforcement built to strengthen a place against attack.
examples: rampart, wall, defense, bulwark, palisade, stockade, redoubt, earthwork, bastion, parapet, barricade fortifications loomed ominously along the high banks of the river

definitions.definition: the action of fortifying or process of being fortified.
synonyms: barricade "fortifications loomed ominously along the high banks of the river"
